name: Quantum Sheep
description:
Game made during Quantum Game Jam 2016 in Otaniemi, Espoo, Finland.

Your goal is to select initial values for your herd of sheep and become the most dominant herd by evolution.

Single player allows you to build one herd.

Multiplayer allows you to put multiple herds against eachother.

Simulation mode allows unlimited options.

Basically all modes work identically for now.

Credits:

Petri Sarasvirta
Antti Paraoanu
Harri Järvinen
Francesco Cosco
Henri Sarasvirta

Music by
Kevin MacLeod

trailer at youtube.
